name: Hooman and The Nema Trisen Forest
name_original: Hooman and The Nema Trisen Forest
description:
Main Concept of The Game

The game will be played with 2 main scene/phase, which is the Map Phase and the Investigation Phase.

The player is playing as 2 characters: Hooman The Druid and Drooid The Human .

The player’s objective is to fully restore the Nema Trisen Forest’s health. 

Players can achieve the objective with conventional (Hooman The Druid) and modern (Drooid The Human) methods. Each methods have their own pros and cons, so players have to choose which methods is the best for their current situation.

Narrative

There are a Sacred Tree in The Nema Trisen Forest. There’s a legend about this tree where it states that this tree will transform corpses that it likes into a druid as a guardian of the forests. Yet no one has seen a walking druid in Nema Trisen Forest. And then there are Drooid the human who loved nature since birth. But ever since he knew what’s Nema Trisen Forest’s state is in and who is responsible, his heart was shattered. After some time contemplating on how to make the forest healthier, he finally decided to become a forest ranger and has learned a lot of knowledge about keeping a forest healthy.

Game Goals

Player need to go to certain events to investigate and finding a way to help the forest healthy again.

Features
  • Complete all kind of events in the map phase
  • Investigate the problem in the forest
  • Find and choose best solution to help the forest
  • Allocate the points you got for skill point and equipment after complete the event 
Controls

All controls using mouse only.
